document_data.name: Topaz
document_data.mainbody:
'''Topaz''' was a [[blue jay]] that nested in the [[Emerald Grove]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|Shh, I'm concentrating. Does this look good? Is the coin in the middle?|Topaz.}}
document_data.Description: He had predominantly blue feathers, with a white breast and legs, and a line of black running along the sides of his neck.
document_data.Activities: Topaz was a discerning bird who was quite concerned with the specific arrangement of his nest. He wanted exactly the right items placed in exact perfect positions within.
document_data.Possessions: Among the items found within Topaz' next were a bundle of straw, a [[magnifying glass]], a single [[currency|gold coin]] and a unique key.
